div.p: The Comes Felix (?): solidi 3 Theodorus his brother: solidi 6 Anoup the riparios: solidi 3 Serenus vir clarissimus: solidi 3 Paul the overseer: solidi 3 Apollos the overseer: solidi 6 Urbicus: solidi 6 Amphouas, son of Psois: solidi 6 George the public weigher: solidi 3 Serenus his brother: solidi 6 Peter the public weigher: solidi 6 Petronius the assistant: solidi 6 Petronius the secretary: solidi 6 Serenus the secretary: solidi … Papnouthios the assistant: solidi … Sergius the magistrianus: solidi 3 Apphouas vir clarissimus: solidi 6 Pamouthios vir clarissimus: solidi 6 Translation: M.C.D. Paganini, ZPE 190 (2014) 229
